title: spack test fails in test/stage.py
body:
Running spack test on SL7 fails in test/stage.py

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```
spack test 
```

### Error Message
```
platform linux2 -- Python 2.7.5, pytest-3.2.5, py-1.4.34, pluggy-0.4.0
rootdir: /build/test/spack/lib/spack/spack/test, inifile: pytest.ini
collected 2297 items                                                                                                                                                                   
...
stage.py .................................F........
...
_______________________________________________________________________ TestStage.test_get_stage_root_in_spack ________________________________________________________________________

self = <spack.test.stage.TestStage object at 0x7fa2f83497d0>, clear_stage_root = None

    def test_get_stage_root_in_spack(self, clear_stage_root):
        """Ensure an instance path is an accessible build stage path."""
        base = canonicalize_path(os.path.join('$spack', '.spack-test-stage'))
        mkdirp(base)
        test_path = tempfile.mkdtemp(dir=base)
    
        try:
            with spack.config.override('config:build_stage',  test_path):
                path = spack.stage.get_stage_root()
    
                assert 'spack' in path.split(os.path.sep)
    
                # Make sure cached stage path value was changed appropriately
>               assert spack.stage._stage_root == test_path
E               AssertionError: assert '/build/test/...vrUg5/gartung' == '/build/test/s...age/tmpmvrUg5'
E                 - /build/test/spack/.spack-test-stage/tmpmvrUg5/gartung
E                 ?                                              --------
E                 + /build/test/spack/.spack-test-stage/tmpmvrUg5

stage.py:836: AssertionError
================================================================================ 2217 tests deselected ================================================================================
=========================================================== 1 failed, 73 passed, 2 skipped, 2217 deselected in 9.22 seconds ===========================================================
```
